Subject: Uninstall Commands Not Working
Description: Hello, I have issued a dozen or so uninstall commands/actions through the server and none of them seem to be working. I can see that the action was sent but it does not look like it ultimately goes through.
What_We_Know__c:
12.05
The EPP Client is not communicating with the EPP Server. We asked the customer to check the license availability and the network connections.

14.05
The customer agrees to test the uninstalling of the EPP clients using an MDM solution.
Next_Steps__c:
12.05
Waiting for the customer to answer.
Solution_Comment__c: The uninstall feature from the EPP UI was not working because the computers were not communicating with the EPP server. We advised the customer to use a MDM solution for this. The MDM uninstall worked.
